title: Did Arthur Dayne have a lover? - Quora

response.answer_text: Not that we know of. Lewyn Martell had and if he had then Jaime would have known. His only flaw for his vows was that he was political and gave his loyalty to a man and not the Throne and participated by silence in atrocities committed by Aerys and taking Lyanna away with Rhaegar. All in all a good man with tragic political oversight and skewed moral compass.
